ygData.subject: Re: New Human SK in Freeport.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, Avoid West Freeport, The Freeport sewers, and East Commons but not because of my Dark Elf bretheren.  Avoid these areas because as I hunt for humans
ygData.messageBody:
Yes,
Avoid West Freeport, The Freeport sewers, and East Commons but not because
of my Dark Elf bretheren. Avoid these areas because as I hunt for humans
there, I see them killing each-other as they shout "shadow knight!" As a
fellow Knight and follower of Innorruk I felt the need to warn you.
Now, if you cross the path of a Dark Elf, and you think that a fight is
brewing, have the following proclamation hotkeyed; "Hail! I am a Shadow
Knight and follower of Innorruk! I have no quarrel with you!" The result
may keep you alive or even make you a friend for a hunt or two! Be prepared
to go "un-anon" though and back up your boast, if asked. My people have many
agents in Rat-port, if you play on Rallos Zek you may be interested in a
buisiness proposition...
I appreciate the roleplay challenge of being an SK in Free-slum, good
luck. ;)

~Xillith, Lady of Pain

>From: nod@...
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] New Human SK in Freeport.

>
>From: nod@...
>
>Since I am Human do i have to worry about all npc out of town? Also are
>there any places in town I should avoid?
